name: Hellfest Simulator
description:
Welcome to the HELLFEST Physic based rythm game The aim of the game is to bring beers to the singer

Welcome to the Hellfest ! You play as Camille a Roadie for the band Kammtamer.
The main goal of the game is to bring beers to the singer. Each (non empty) beer you bring to the singer will inscrease your score.

Little warning : you can experience some performance issues, if you do, please launch the game in "Very High" instead of "Ultra", less beautiful but more stable

The Team
  • Loic 'Xahell' Allart : coding
  • Alexis 'Raoul' Renart : coding
  • Simon 'GoZz' Mielcarek : coding
    • http://www.mielcarek.fr/
    • @FatGozz on twitter
  • Sarah 'Himeija' Menouar : graphic design
    • https://www.himeija.com/ 
    • @Himeija on twitter
  • Elio Germani : Music and Sounds
    • https://soundcloud.com/elio-germani
How to play the game

ZQSD for azerty players

WASD for qwerty players

arrows for newbies

An LDJam Game

You can see our submission on LDJam by following this link : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/hellfest-simulator

Special Thanks

Hieros for the voice
